name: Litr
description: <dfn><abbr>Litr</abbr> (Language Independent Task Runner)</dfn> lets you configure and then run any tasks you want for any language.

name: Krieselreihe
description: <dfn>"Krieselreihe"</dfn> is the name I do all my hobby game development under. While doing this, a set of tools emerged e.g. Litr and Natr, located under this namespace.

links.title: The organisation page on GitHub for Krieselreihe.

name: number-generator
description: Generate repeatable pseudo random numbers and non-cryptographic hash numbers for usage in Node.js and browser environments.
